div.p: What makes NHCS so special? Watch our videos, learn about Our Approach and Our Results!
Announcements, forms, handbooks, and everything you need as a parent of an NHCS scholar. Click here.
NHCS is tuition-free and all students are enrolled through an open lottery. We encourage any family who is eligible to apply. Apply today!

p.a: Learn more about NHCS High School (grades 8-12)
Learn More about NHCS Middle School (grades 5-7)

div.p: NHCS combines rich and structured academics with extensive social/emotional programming to help all our students succeed in school and in life. We strive to develop scholars who seek knowledge, embrace effort, act thoughtfully, and commit to the common good. Learn More >

img.alt: Button – Donate to NHCS or a teacher project

div.div: © 2019 Neighborhood House Charter School | Privacy Policy | Credits
